channel.title: IMPORTANT : Few questions i need answer for it
channel.description:
My source is ddsspeced and i need answers for these questions :confused::
1st. How can i make the d claws and D body an existing items?
2nd. How can i add specials for the d claws (4 hits per spec) ?
3rd. how can i edit item bonus ?
4th. How can i add auto message?
and thank you :)

item.title: IMPORTANT : Few questions i need answer for it
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“3nch4nt3d, post:1, topic:272263”]My source is ddsspeced and i need answers for these questions :

1st. How can i make the d claws and D body an existing items?

2nd. How can i add specials for the d claws (4 hits per spec) ?

3rd. how can i edit item bonus ?

4th. How can i add auto message?

and thank you :)[/quote]

  1. Models Section

  2. Search bar

  3. item.cfg

  4. sendMessage("Message here"); // might have to replace sendMessage with sM
